Function reference

All functions

CleanAmericanStates()
Clean states from the USA
CleanCanadaStates()
Clean states from Canada
CleanIndianStates()
Clean Indian States
CleanSouthAfricanStates()
Clean states from South Africa
CollapseLineageToVOCs()
Collpase pangolin lineage a list of VOCs
CombineSequencedCases()
Create a combined dataframe of sequenced cases and confirmed cases
CountsToPrevalence()
Convert monthwise counts to prevalence
EpicovrTheme()
Set them
FilterGISAIDIndia()
Filter GISAID India Metadata for India
FormatGISAIDMetadata()
Format metadata.tar.x file downloaded from GISAID with some missing columns
GeocodeAddress()
Geocode a given address to get its latitude, longitude from Gooogle
GetFiletype()
Determine filetype
GetIndiaConfirmedCasesCumulative()
Get daily confirmed cases for India
GetIndiaConfirmedCasesMonthlyLong()
Get India monthwose cases long
GetIndiaConfirmedCasesWeeklyLong()
Get India weekwise cases long
GetIndiaDailyCasesCumulative()
Get daily cases for India for a given status type
GetIndiaDailyData()
Get daily statewise data for India
GetIndiaDeceasedCasesCumulative()
Get daily deceased cases for India
GetIndiaHospitalization()
Get hospitalization data for India
GetIndianStates()
Get a list of Indian name states
GetMonthYear()
Get MonthYear (zoo) from a dataframe string formatted data column
GetVOCs()
Get variants of concern
PlotSequencedPropHeatmap()
Plot heatmap of cases sequenced
ReadAuspiceInstrument()
Read instrument metadata from GISAID batch downloads
ReadAuspiceMetadata()
Read all metadata from GISAID batch downloads
ReadGISAIDMetada()
Read metadata downloaded from GISAID
SanitizeColumn()
Sanitize a vector to remove special characters and convert it to tile
SummarizeVariantsDatewise()
Summarize the total number of variants per week
SummarizeVariantsMonthwise()
Summarize the total number of variants per month
SummarizeVariantsWeekwise()
Summarize the total number of variants per week
TotalSequencesPerMonthCountrywise()
Get total sequenced samples per country
TotalSequencesPerMonthStatewise()
Get total number of sequenced samples per month in a Country
